You're noisy!\""},{"lineNumber":5,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいはい、ごめんなさい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, alright, I'm Lezass,"},{"lineNumber":9,"originalJapaneseLine":"近くの鉱山から良質な鋼が取れることから","translatedEnglishLine":"and prospered due to quality steel mined nearby."},{"lineNumber":10,"originalJapaneseLine":"栄えるようになった土地である。","translatedEnglishLine":"It is a land that has flourished because of this."},{"lineNumber":11,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、今あなたが足を踏み入れた土地は、","translatedEnglishLine":"However, the land you have just set foot on"},{"lineNumber":12,"originalJapaneseLine":"決してそんな風には見えなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"did not look like that at all."},{"lineNumber":13,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわっ……なんだこりゃ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa... what is this...?\""},{"lineNumber":14,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう、なんとも不気味な都市だすな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, this city sure is creepy...\""},{"lineNumber":15,"originalJapaneseLine":"街全体は眠りについたように静まりかえり、","translatedEnglishLine":"The entire town was silent as if it had fallen asleep,"},{"lineNumber":16,"originalJapaneseLine":"木々がかすかにさわさわと揺れていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"with trees barely rustling in the breeze."},{"lineNumber":17,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人っ子一人見当たらないだす……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Not a single person in sight...\""},{"lineNumber":18,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ゴーストタウンって奴だすか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is this what they call a ghost town...?\""},{"lineNumber":19,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、まだ暮らしてる奴はいんぜ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, there are still some living here.\""},{"lineNumber":20,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人間がこんなとこで暮らしてるだすか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Humans living in a place like this!?\""},{"lineNumber":21,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いるのは人間じゃねーよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The ones here aren’t humans.\""},{"lineNumber":22,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔軍だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They are the demon army.\""},{"lineNumber":23,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、魔物が暮らしてるのか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, monsters actually live here!?\""},{"lineNumber":24,"originalJapaneseLine":"「第二次魔人戦争……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The Second Demon monsters"},{"lineNumber":27,"originalJapaneseLine":"　攻め込んできて領地を奪っていたんだが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"invaded across the world and seized territories...\""},{"lineNumber":28,"originalJapaneseLine":"「このスケールはリーザス方面にいた魔軍が、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This city, Scale, was where the demon army near Lezass"},{"lineNumber":29,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦争終結時に集まり立てこもった都市だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"gathered and holed up at the end of the war.\""},{"lineNumber":30,"originalJapaneseLine":"「連中、戦争はもう終わったと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Those guys refuse to accept that the war is over,"},{"lineNumber":31,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こっちが何度言っても認めようとしねぇで、","translatedEnglishLine":"no matter how many times we tell them,\""},{"lineNumber":32,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ずーっとここを領地として占領し続けてんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"and have kept occupying this place as their territory.\""},{"lineNumber":33,"originalJapaneseLine":"「占領し続けてるって……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They've kept occupying it...?"},{"lineNumber":34,"originalJapaneseLine":"　え、だって第二次魔人戦争ってもう――」","translatedEnglishLine":"But the Second Demon War ended already—\""},{"lineNumber":35,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、そうだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, that’s right."},{"lineNumber":36,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう十五年も連中はここを根城にしてんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"They’ve used this place as their stronghold for fifteen years.\""},{"lineNumber":37,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うひーっ！？　十五年！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek!? Fifteen years!?\""},{"lineNumber":38,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うちの国としても放置はできねぇ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Our country can’t just ignore this either."},{"lineNumber":39,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何度か攻め込んだらしいんだが……","translatedEnglishLine":"Apparently, they’ve attacked several times..."},{"lineNumber":40,"originalJapaneseLine":"　奴らは都市内のゲリラ戦法で抵抗しやがる」","translatedEnglishLine":"But those guys use guerrilla tactics inside the city to resist.\""},{"lineNumber":41,"originalJapaneseLine":"「埒が明かねぇ、被害も無駄に出るってんで、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's hopeless, and casualties end up being uselessly high,"},{"lineNumber":42,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この都市の周囲に見張りを置いて、","translatedEnglishLine":"so we stationed guards around the city,"},{"lineNumber":43,"originalJapaneseLine":"　奴らを十五年も閉じ込めてんのが現状だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"and have been trapping them inside for fifteen years.\""},{"lineNumber":44,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔軍の規模はー？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is the size of the demon army?\""},{"lineNumber":45,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ざっと1000名ってところだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"About a thousand, roughly.\""},{"lineNumber":46,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむむー、結構いるねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, quite a number.\""},{"lineNumber":47,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しっかし、面倒臭ぇところにオーブがあるもんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Still, it’s annoying that the orb is in such a troublesome place.\""},{"lineNumber":48,"originalJapaneseLine":"「つまり、ゲリラとして都市に立てこもっている","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In other words, we have to find the orb somewhere inside this large city"},{"lineNumber":49,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔軍から逃げたり戦ったりしながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"while running from or fighting the guerrilla demon army holed up here,"},{"lineNumber":50,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この広い都市のどこかからオーブを見つける、と」","translatedEnglishLine":"and search for the orb somewhere in this huge city.\""},{"lineNumber":51,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":52,"originalJapaneseLine":"「無理じゃね？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Isn’t that impossible?\""},{"lineNumber":53,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はんっ、立ち塞がる敵は殺す！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph! Kill any enemy that stands in our way!"},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"　邪魔をする奴は殺す！","translatedEnglishLine":"Kill anyone who interferes!"},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物は全てブッ殺す！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Kill all the monsters!\""},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうすりゃオーブ探しも","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If we do that, looking for the orb"},{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ゆーっくり出来るってもんじゃねぇか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"can be done at a leisurely pace!\""},{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははははははははは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahahahahahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なんか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-what is it...?"},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"もしかして、上機嫌？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Could it be you’re in a good mood?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今の……もしかして本気で言った……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Just now... did you seriously mean that...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが本気なのよ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I am serious about it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この子、馬鹿だから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's just stupid."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「志津香！　うるせぇぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shizuka! You're noisy!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はいはい、ごめんなさい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, alright, I'm sorry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして一行は、リーザスを出立した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And so, the group departed from Lezass.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 放棄された都市、スケール――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The abandoned city, Scale—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスの北東に位置する中堅都市であり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is a mid-sized city located northeast of Lezass,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近くの鉱山から良質な鋼が取れることから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and prospered due to quality steel mined nearby.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 栄えるようになった土地である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is a land that has flourished because of this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、今あなたが足を踏み入れた土地は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the land you have just set foot on

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決してそんな風には見えなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: did not look like that at all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわっ……なんだこりゃ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa... what is this...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うう、なんとも不気味な都市だすな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, this city sure is creepy..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街全体は眠りについたように静まりかえり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The entire town was silent as if it had fallen asleep,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 木々がかすかにさわさわと揺れていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: with trees barely rustling in the breeze.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人っ子一人見当たらないだす……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not a single person in sight..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゴーストタウンって奴だすか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is this what they call a ghost town...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、まだ暮らしてる奴はいんぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, there are still some living here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間がこんなとこで暮らしてるだすか！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Humans living in a place like this!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いるのは人間じゃねーよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The ones here aren’t humans."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They are the demon army."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、魔物が暮らしてるのか！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh, monsters actually live here!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「第二次魔人戦争……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Second Demon War...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺らの親父が魔王になるきっかけの戦争だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was the war that led my father to become a Demon King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その戦争中、魔軍の魔物は世界中に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "During that war, the demon army’s monsters

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻め込んできて領地を奪っていたんだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: invaded across the world and seized territories..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このスケールはリーザス方面にいた魔軍が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This city, Scale, was where the demon army near Lezass

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争終結時に集まり立てこもった都市だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: gathered and holed up at the end of the war."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「連中、戦争はもう終わったと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Those guys refuse to accept that the war is over,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっちが何度言っても認めようとしねぇで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: no matter how many times we tell them,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずーっとここを領地として占領し続けてんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and have kept occupying this place as their territory."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「占領し続けてるって……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They've kept occupying it...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: え、だって第二次魔人戦争ってもう――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But the Second Demon War ended already—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、そうだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, that’s right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう十五年も連中はここを根城にしてんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They’ve used this place as their stronghold for fifteen years."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うひーっ！？　十五年！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eek!? Fifteen years!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うちの国としても放置はできねぇ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Our country can’t just ignore this either.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何度か攻め込んだらしいんだが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, they’ve attacked several times...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴らは都市内のゲリラ戦法で抵抗しやがる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But those guys use guerrilla tactics inside the city to resist."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「埒が明かねぇ、被害も無駄に出るってんで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's hopeless, and casualties end up being uselessly high,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この都市の周囲に見張りを置いて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so we stationed guards around the city,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴らを十五年も閉じ込めてんのが現状だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and have been trapping them inside for fifteen years."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍の規模はー？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What is the size of the demon army?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ざっと1000名ってところだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "About a thousand, roughly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむむー、結構いるねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, quite a number."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しっかし、面倒臭ぇところにオーブがあるもんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Still, it’s annoying that the orb is in such a troublesome place."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「つまり、ゲリラとして都市に立てこもっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In other words, we have to find the orb somewhere inside this large city

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍から逃げたり戦ったりしながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: while running from or fighting the guerrilla demon army holed up here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この広い都市のどこかからオーブを見つける、と」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and search for the orb somewhere in this huge city."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無理じゃね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Isn’t that impossible?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はんっ、立ち塞がる敵は殺す！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph! Kill any enemy that stands in our way!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 邪魔をする奴は殺す！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kill anyone who interferes!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物は全てブッ殺す！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kill all the monsters!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうすりゃオーブ探しも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If we do that, looking for the orb

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゆーっくり出来るってもんじゃねぇか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: can be done at a leisurely pace!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははははははははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahahahahahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-what is it...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしかして、上機嫌？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could it be you’re in a good mood?"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Kill any enemy that stands in our way!"},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"　邪魔をする奴は殺す！","translatedEnglishLine":"Kill anyone who interferes!"},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物は全てブッ殺す！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Kill all the monsters!\""},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうすりゃオーブ探しも","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If we do that, looking for the orb"},{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ゆーっくり出来るってもんじゃねぇか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"can be done at a leisurely pace!\""},{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははははははははは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahahahahahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なんか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-what is it...?"},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"もしかして、上機嫌？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Could it be you’re in a good mood?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今の……もしかして本気で言った……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Just now... did you seriously mean that...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが本気なのよ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I am serious about it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この子、馬鹿だから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's just stupid."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「志津香！　うるせぇぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shizuka! You're noisy!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はいはい、ごめんなさい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, alright, I'm sorry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして一行は、リーザスを出立した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And so, the group departed from Lezass.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 放棄された都市、スケール――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The abandoned city, Scale—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスの北東に位置する中堅都市であり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is a mid-sized city located northeast of Lezass,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近くの鉱山から良質な鋼が取れることから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and prospered due to quality steel mined nearby.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 栄えるようになった土地である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is a land that has flourished because of this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、今あなたが足を踏み入れた土地は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the land you have just set foot on

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決してそんな風には見えなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: did not look like that at all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわっ……なんだこりゃ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa... what is this...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うう、なんとも不気味な都市だすな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, this city sure is creepy..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街全体は眠りについたように静まりかえり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The entire town was silent as if it had fallen asleep,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 木々がかすかにさわさわと揺れていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: with trees barely rustling in the breeze.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人っ子一人見当たらないだす……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not a single person in sight..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゴーストタウンって奴だすか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is this what they call a ghost town...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、まだ暮らしてる奴はいんぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, there are still some living here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間がこんなとこで暮らしてるだすか！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Humans living in a place like this!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いるのは人間じゃねーよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The ones here aren’t humans."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They are the demon army."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、魔物が暮らしてるのか！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh, monsters actually live here!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「第二次魔人戦争……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Second Demon War...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺らの親父が魔王になるきっかけの戦争だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was the war that led my father to become a Demon King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その戦争中、魔軍の魔物は世界中に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "During that war, the demon army’s monsters

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻め込んできて領地を奪っていたんだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: invaded across the world and seized territories..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このスケールはリーザス方面にいた魔軍が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This city, Scale, was where the demon army near Lezass

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争終結時に集まり立てこもった都市だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: gathered and holed up at the end of the war."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「連中、戦争はもう終わったと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Those guys refuse to accept that the war is over,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっちが何度言っても認めようとしねぇで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: no matter how many times we tell them,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずーっとここを領地として占領し続けてんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and have kept occupying this place as their territory."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「占領し続けてるって……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They've kept occupying it...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: え、だって第二次魔人戦争ってもう――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But the Second Demon War ended already—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、そうだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, that’s right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう十五年も連中はここを根城にしてんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They’ve used this place as their stronghold for fifteen years."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うひーっ！？　十五年！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eek!? Fifteen years!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うちの国としても放置はできねぇ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Our country can’t just ignore this either.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何度か攻め込んだらしいんだが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, they’ve attacked several times...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴らは都市内のゲリラ戦法で抵抗しやがる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But those guys use guerrilla tactics inside the city to resist."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「埒が明かねぇ、被害も無駄に出るってんで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's hopeless, and casualties end up being uselessly high,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この都市の周囲に見張りを置いて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so we stationed guards around the city,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴らを十五年も閉じ込めてんのが現状だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and have been trapping them inside for fifteen years."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍の規模はー？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What is the size of the demon army?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ざっと1000名ってところだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "About a thousand, roughly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむむー、結構いるねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, quite a number."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しっかし、面倒臭ぇところにオーブがあるもんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Still, it’s annoying that the orb is in such a troublesome place."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「つまり、ゲリラとして都市に立てこもっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In other words, we have to find the orb somewhere inside this large city

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍から逃げたり戦ったりしながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: while running from or fighting the guerrilla demon army holed up here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この広い都市のどこかからオーブを見つける、と」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and search for the orb somewhere in this huge city."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無理じゃね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Isn’t that impossible?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はんっ、立ち塞がる敵は殺す！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph! Kill any enemy that stands in our way!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 邪魔をする奴は殺す！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kill anyone who interferes!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物は全てブッ殺す！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kill all the monsters!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうすりゃオーブ探しも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If we do that, looking for the orb

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゆーっくり出来るってもんじゃねぇか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: can be done at a leisurely pace!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははははははははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahahahahahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-what is it...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしかして、上機嫌？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could it be you’re in a good mood?"
